amendment.description: Amendment gives USDOT authority to appoint and oversee the four Federal members to the WMATA board rather than continuing with the current GSA responsibility to make such appointments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 18 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to give USDOT authority to appoint and oversee the fed board members to the WMATA board, while currently GSA has this responsibility.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Edwards amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A059) offered by Ms. Edwards to the Rules amendment (A001).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Edwards amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A059) offered by Ms. Edwards to the Rules amendment (A001).
